original_title: Chris Isaak: Greatest Hits Live Concert
overview: With emotion-filled twang and matinee idol looks, singer, songwriter and actor Chris Isaak croons 15 of his greatest hits, including "Wicked Game," for an enthusiastic crowd in this concert recorded live for the PBS series "Soundstage." Isaak also offers a compelling rendition of "Baby Did a Bad, Bad Thing," plus more of his unforgettable melodies and heartfelt lyrics in an engaging six-song acoustic set.
title: Chris Isaak: Greatest Hits Live Concert
